subject: Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: Somebeachsomewhere was drawn outside of his five rivals and made the 1-2 early favorite for Yonkers Raceway’s Messenger Stakes. Somebeachsomewhere, the fastest 3-year-old in harness history, will be driven by Paul MacDonell. The Messenger Stakes, the final race in pacing’s Triple Crown, is Saturday.
